opis: Ova luksuzna kuća za odmor za 20 osoba nalazi se na otoku Kaprije u Šibenskom arhipelagu. Sastoji se od jednog objekta; devet dvokrevetnih spavaćih sobe (svaka s kupaonicom), prostranu kuhinju i dnevni boravak koji je idealan za više obitelji. Na terasi kata nalazi jacuzzi, a u dvorištu bazen 35 m2 za ugodne trenutke osvježenja i opuštanja od svakodnevnog stresa. U kući je smještena finska sauna, biljar, pikado. Parking za vozila rezerviran je 10 m od trajektne luke u Šibeniku, a kuća je 20 m od trajekta. Na otoku nema pristupa automobilima pa možete istinski uživati u netaknutoj prirodi. Zbog svog položaja (u blizini NP Kornati) idealno je polazište za posjete brojnim okolnim otocima s prekrasnim zaklonjenim uvalama i plažama. Vlasnik (uz doplatu) nudi iznajmljivanje čamaca, jet-skija, kanua i bicikala/električnih bicikala kako biste s trajektom i biciklom mogli posjetiti i drugi otok i grad Šibenik. U dogovoru s vlasnikom moguće je organizirati izlete u NP Kornati, NP Krka, obilazak grada Šibenika, Zadra, Splita i drugih znamenitosti. Postoji i mogućnost naručivanja autentičnih jela i pića. U rano proljeće i kasnu jesen vlasnik nudi mogućnost ribolova (lov) na lignje i hobotnice te branje maslina i izradu maslinovog ulja. Za više informacija i informacije o cijenama i dostupnosti molimo kontaktirajte nas putem WhatsAppa/Vibera na broj: 00385 98 322 241 ili putem e-maila: kapetanova.vila.kaprije@gmail.com This luxurious holiday home for 20 people is located on the Island Kaprije in the Šibenik archipelago. It consists of one object; four double bedrooms (each with a bathroom), a spacious kitchen, and a living room which is ideal for two families. On the bottom floor terrace, there is a barbecue and table for eating, there is a whirlpool on the first floor for pleasant moments of refreshment and relaxation from everyday stress. Parking for vehicles is reserved 10 m from the ferry port and the house is 20 m from the ferry. There is no access for cars on the island so you can truly enjoy the pristine nature. Because of its position (near the NP Kornati), it's the ideal starting point for visits to numerous surrounding islands with beautiful sheltered coves and beaches. The owner (for an extra charge) offers boats, jet-ski, canoe, and bicycle/electric bicycle rental so you can go and visit, with ferry and bicycle, other island and Šibenik city. In agreement with the owner, it is possible to organize excursions to NP Kornati, NP Krka, a tour of the city of Šibenik, Zadar, Split and other sights. There is also a possibility of ordering authentic meals and drinks. In early spring and the late fall, the owner offers the possibility of fishing (hunting) for squids and octopuses and picking olives and olive oil making. For more information and information on prices and availability, please contact us via WhatsApp / Viber on the number: 00385 98 322 241 or via e-mail: kapetanova.vila.kaprije@gmail.com
Grijanje: Sustav grijanja: Sustav grijanja, klimatizacije i ventilacije
